mapper.sql: online_uob_id as onlineUobId , ccd_id as ccdId , rest_id as restId , notes as notes , people_num as peopleNum , avoidfood_id_array as avoidfoodIdArray , pungent_level as pungentLevel , create_time as createTime , gender as gender , order_way as orderWay , order_people_name as orderPeopleName , update_time as updateTime , cpt_id as cptId , bill_from as billFrom , order_id as orderId , cancle_reason as cancleReason , online_dining_time as onlineDiningTime , online_area_name as onlineAreaName , mb_id as mbId , online_gender as onlineGender , dining_time as diningTime , moling_mode_cost as molingModeCost , taste_name_array as tasteNameArray , online_telphone as onlineTelphone , avoidfood_name_array as avoidfoodNameArray , order_time as orderTime , ori_cost as oriCost , update_by as updateBy , tab_id as tabId , online_order_id as onlineOrderId , telphone as telphone , online_area_id as onlineAreaId , bill_id as billId , version as version , order_status as orderStatus , tab_no as tabNo , online_payment_type as onlinePaymentType , online_order_no as onlineOrderNo , prepay as prepay , online_people_num as onlinePeopleNum , taste_id_array as tasteIdArray , syn_version as synVersion , mc_id as mcId , sales_mg_id as salesMgId , order_people_name_code as orderPeopleNameCode , online_user_mobile as onlineUserMobile , online_mobile as onlineMobile , online_order_people_name as onlineOrderPeopleName , create_by as createBy , is_moling as isMoling , is_syn as isSyn , waiter_id as waiterId , meal_standard as mealStandard , order_no as orderNo
mapper.insert:
insert into cm_table_order( online_uob_id ,
ccd_id ,
rest_id ,
notes ,
people_num ,
avoidfood_id_array ,
pungent_level ,
create_time ,
gender ,
order_way ,
order_people_name ,
update_time ,
cpt_id ,
bill_from ,
order_id ,
cancle_reason ,
online_dining_time ,
online_area_name ,
mb_id ,
online_gender ,
dining_time ,
moling_mode_cost ,
taste_name_array ,
online_telphone ,
avoidfood_name_array ,
order_time ,
ori_cost ,
update_by ,
tab_id ,
online_order_id ,
telphone ,
online_area_id ,
bill_id ,
version ,
order_status ,
tab_no ,
online_payment_type ,
online_order_no ,
prepay ,
online_people_num ,
taste_id_array ,
syn_version ,
mc_id ,
sales_mg_id ,
order_people_name_code ,
online_user_mobile ,
online_mobile ,
online_order_people_name ,
create_by ,
is_moling ,
is_syn ,
waiter_id ,
meal_standard ,
order_no
) values ( #\{onlineUobId \} , #\{ccdId \} , #\{restId \} , #\{notes \} , #\{peopleNum \} , #\{avoidfoodIdArray \} , #\{pungentLevel \} , #\{createTime \} , #\{gender \} , #\{orderWay \} , #\{orderPeopleName \} , #\{updateTime \} , #\{cptId \} , #\{billFrom \} , #\{orderId \} , #\{cancleReason \} , #\{onlineDiningTime \} , #\{onlineAreaName \} , #\{mbId \} , #\{onlineGender \} , #\{diningTime \} , #\{molingModeCost \} , #\{tasteNameArray \} , #\{onlineTelphone \} , #\{avoidfoodNameArray \} , #\{orderTime \} , #\{oriCost \} , #\{updateBy \} , #\{tabId \} , #\{onlineOrderId \} , #\{telphone \} , #\{onlineAreaId \} , #\{billId \} , #\{version \} , #\{orderStatus \} , #\{tabNo \} , #\{onlinePaymentType \} , #\{onlineOrderNo \} , #\{prepay \} , #\{onlinePeopleNum \} , #\{tasteIdArray \} , #\{synVersion \} , #\{mcId \} , #\{salesMgId \} , #\{orderPeopleNameCode \} , #\{onlineUserMobile \} , #\{onlineMobile \} , #\{onlineOrderPeopleName \} , #\{createBy \} , #\{isMoling \} , #\{isSyn \} , #\{waiterId \} , #\{mealStandard \} , #\{orderNo \} )
